The '''Q Shaman''', real name Jacob Anthony Angeli Chansley, is an American conspiracy theorist and supporter of the [[QAnon]] movement. He gained national attention for his role in [[January 6th Insurrection|the storming of the United States Capitol on January 6, 2021]], during which he wore a distinctive outfit and carried a spear adorned with an American flag. He was subsequently arrested and charged with a variety of offenses. He plead guilty, and is currently serving a 41 month sentence in Federal Prison.

He has a variety of aliases, pen-names, and nicknames, including Jake Angeli, the QAnon Shaman, and "Yellowstone Wolf".
